description: '''Stefan Petrus Dekker''' (born 31 July 1988), better known by his stage name '''Dr. Peacock''', is a Dutch [[frenchcore]] [[DJ]] and [[record producer]]. He has performed on the main stages of major festivals like [[Thunderdome (music festival)|Thunderdome]], [[Defqon.1]], [[Qlimax]] and [[Q-dance#dominator|Dominator]]. And owns a merchandise store where he sells [https://www.frenchcoreworldwide.store/collections/dr-peacock Dr. Peacock merchandise].
